short_summary: Immigration Services for the National Research Council (NRC)
description: The NRC is seeking an experienced immigration consulting firm to support the recruitment and retention of foreign workers.
full_summary:
**Tender Notice: Immigration Services for the National Research Council**

**Summary:**
The National Research Council (NRC) is seeking an experienced immigration consulting firm to support the recruitment and retention of foreign workers. The successful bidder will need to demonstrate a high level of expertise in immigration consulting services.

**Tender Details:**
* **Procurement ID**: cb-172-19325057
* **Notice Date**: January 17, 2024
* **Closing Date**: February 20, 2024
* **Expected Start Date**: April 1, 2024
* **Expected End Date**: March 31, 2026

**Eligible Solicitation Methods:**
This opportunity is open to all qualified bidders.

**Trade Agreements:**
The successful bidder will be eligible to submit a response under the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

**Notice Attachments:**
Please find the following documents attached to this notice:
* Security Annex - Revised
* Request for Proposal: Immigration Services
* Questions and Answers

**Point of Contact:**
Philippe G. Cléroux, [philippe.cleroux@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca](mailto:philippe.cleroux@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca), (343) 572-1109

Note: Please let me know if you need me to write the content on Government of Canada tender site in a different format.
